bike.description: Reynolds 720/520 premium Cr-Mo frame, custom cast track dropouts and brake arch, stainless steel belt link

components.description: Lugged Cr-Mo fork, w/ integrated cast drop outs, hidden Globe Accessory mounting eyelets
Tange 1" threaded, sealed loose ball bearings
Globe Roll w/ custom alloy end plug
Custom alloy single speed crank w/integrated hollow Cr-Mo spindle
Platform pedal w/ two-piece alloy cage, single strap
Custom box section rims, sleeve joint, machined sidewalls, 32h
Globe Roll, sealed bearing, high flange with custom CNC detail, bolt-on, 32h
Specialized Espoir Sport, Flak Jacket, 60TPI, wire bead, 700x23c
Specialized Espoir Sport, Flak Jacket, 60TPI, wire bead, 700x23c
Custom Globe Body Geometry City Speed saddle, perforated microfiber top, hollow rails
